name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: NotionToSubstack : import in Substack from Notion

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Publish your Notion page and import it with one-click to your Substack draft, your images included !

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Each time you copy/paste your newsletter from your Notion page, you lose the images. So you waste 10 minutes to download them and to change them within your Substack draft. 

Now, with NotionToSubtack, you can easily import your newsletter with one-click. 

You just have to : 
1 - Publish your Notion page
2 - Go to your empty Substack draft
3 - Enter your Notion URL within the extension popup

And voil√† ! 

Your newsletter is imported with the images directly within Substack ! 

Time (re)gain : 10 minutes
